# default IPv4 entries
#
127.0.0.1	localhost.localnet localhost

# default IPv6 entries
#
::1		ipv6-localhost ipv6-loopback
fe00::0		ipv6-localnet
ff00::0		ipv6-mcastprefix
ff02::1		ipv6-allnodes
ff02::2		ipv6-allrouters
